activities: Our company provides a service that enables senders of bulk email newsletters to personalize content within the emails based on NON-personally identifiable data collected at the moment a recipient opens the message.  Senders may optionally, at their discretion, combine our system's NON-personally identifiable personalization capabilites with personally identifiable information housed in the sender's own database.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client, site visitor.  No data is manually processed
recoursemech: Independent arbitration incorporating the Safe Harbor Framework; third-party audit; legal venue Santa Clara, California
